T02D3005:62b-0: @62b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3005:62b-1: bsgrub bya rengs par byed pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
T02D3005:62b-2: 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i nga rgyal
T02D3005:62b-3: dang ldan pas sngon du sarba sha tr'um h'um zhes
T02D3005:62b-4: pa la bsnyen pa 'du ma phrag bdun bskyal nas
T02D3005:62b-5: / de nas nya gro dha'i lo ma la brgya
T02D3005:62b-6: rtsa brgyad bsngags nas ce spyang gi khrag dang bsres
T02D3005:62b-7: nas bsgrub bya'i lus la reg par gtor na nges
T02D3005:62b-9: sems can thams cad rengs par byed pa'i las jag chings 'phrul yig ces bya ba /
